name: Pirate Mayhem
description:
YARRRRRR!!! You're a captain of a mighty pirate ship!

Discover new islands and kill anyone who dares to cross your path. Take care of your retarded crew: man cannons, take the heel, fix any holes the hull, etc.

Move further to meet more deadly enemy ships!

The game was originally made for Ludum Dare #36, 72h solo jam entry.
